object.creator: 戴文生
object.name: lcIB_GS_ZZPZSCLC
object.package: 101_固收.2_后续管理.B4-转账凭证上传流程

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcib_GS_ZZPZSCLC"+"&Ywlx=120000";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

constraint.SQL:
["exists (select 1 from ecif.lcIB_GS_CGDF a where a.instid = tIB_OS_WFENTRY.ID and a.zqmc = {0})
or exists (select 1 from ecif.lcIB_GS_CGFX b where b.instid = tIB_OS_WFENTRY.ID and b.zqmc = {0})
or exists (select 1 from ecif.lcIB_GS_FXHS c where c.instid = tIB_OS_WFENTRY.ID and c.zqmc = {0})
or exists (select 1 from ecif.lcIB_GS_FXSH d where d.instid = tIB_OS_WFENTRY.ID and d.zqmc = {0})
or exists (select 1 from ecif.lcIB_GS_QYZFXTQCHBJ e where e.instid = tIB_OS_WFENTRY.ID and e.zqmc = {0})",[{"expression":"ZQMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_ZZPZSCLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_GS_ZZPZSCLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_ZZPZSCLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
